_header: Walterius Pollard non est but a dullard
_description: Derogatory verse on Walter Pollard — one couplet

BodRawD328.Transcription:
Walterius Pollard non est but a dullardI say that Pollard is
                    none mery gollard
BodRawD328.Note: Walter Pollard of Plymouth, owner from 1444-45,
BodRawD328.Editions:
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 563.
